comment: I concur. Passing through immigration into the UK, I was coming up the queue to the Immigration Officer. There were three of them. Two standing behind the seated one. Quietly discussing with one another. When it was my turn, with my US passport open in front of him, showing my legal name, I was addressed by my WRITER'S NAME. "What is the purpose of your visit, Mr Meyrick?" I don't know if that was an accidental slip, a deliberate one, a threat, or a warning.
